name: gitterra
description: A git-based game running in CI/CD and played by coding

scripts.test: cd test && rm -f index.html && node ../src/generateMap.js ../ /usr/local/bin/scc && open-cli index.html
scripts.test:repo: cd test && rm -f index.html && node ../src/generateMap.js ~/GitTerra_TestRepo/ /usr/local/bin/scc && open-cli index.html
scripts.test:sergeyche: cd test && rm -f index.html && node ../src/generateMap.js ~/sergeychernyshev.com/ /usr/local/bin/scc && open-cli index.html
scripts.clean-test: cd test && rm -f index.html map.png history.json

author: Chernyshev DEV
